sentences.sentence: Some adjectives can only be used attributively.
sentences.translation: 有些形容词只能用作定语。

sentences.sentence: In most languages adjectives have slightly different spellings for masculine and feminine.
sentences.translation: 在大多数语言中形容词对于阳性和阴性有略微不同的拼写。

sentences.sentence: "Ecological" has become one of the most overworked adjectives among manufacturers of garden supplies.
sentences.translation: “生态的”已成为园艺用品制造商最为滥用的形容词之一。
